name: Serverless Cloud Blog Platform
description: Production-ready, full-stack serverless blog platform using AWS CDK (Python) with strong focus on security, scalability, and DevOps automation.
highlights: Architected multi-environment (Dev/Prod) cloud infrastructure using AWS CDK v2
Implemented DynamoDB Single-Table Design for optimized data modeling
Built RESTful HTTP APIs using AWS Lambda (Python) and API Gateway
Established keyless CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions with OIDC authentication
Deployed frontend via S3 and CloudFront CDN for global content delivery

Managed student and company data efficiently
